name: .VMV File Extension
summary: Learn about .VMV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game recording created by VisualBoyAdvance, a Gameboy Advance emulator; saves keystrokes and other information that allows the recording to be played back in the emulator; saved in a proprietary format and cannot be played by standard video players.

content: NOTE: The VisualBoyAdvance VMV format is not compatible with the VMV format used by VirtuaNES.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
